title: Quiet Luxury Handbags 2025: The Row, Loro Piana & Savette Are the New Status Bags
shortdescription: Old money aesthetic is dominating – these are the bags replacing logos.
author: Jane Doe

content.content: Logos Are Out — Understatement Is In

2025’s biggest handbag trend? Bags that cost more than a car but have zero visible branding. The Row’s Margaux and Park Tote, Loro Piana’s Extra Pocket pouch, and Savette’s Symmetry are now the ultimate status symbols.
A-listers like Kendall Jenner, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, and Zoe Kravitz have ditched their Chanel and Hermès for these minimalist masterpieces — because real money doesn’t need to scream.
